dropdown

\n

示例

\n

##分割下拉 \n分割下拉由一个文字和一个图标组成。

\n
    \n
  • 创建一个含有u-button-group、u-split的div容器
    • \n
  • 在第一步中的div容器中创建含有u-split-pre的button
    • \n
  • 接着在第一步中的div容器中创建含有u-button-group、u-split-sub的div容器。在容器此div中创建菜单按钮
    • \n
\n
\n \n
\n \n
    \n
  • 报价单
    • \n
  • 到货单
    • \n
\n
\n
\n
<div class="u-button-group u-split">
\n <button class="u-button u-split-pre">
\n 打印
\n </button>
\n <div class="u-button-group u-split-sub">
\n <button class="u-button u-dropdown-toggle" id="split">
\n <span class=" uf uf-anglearrowdown "></span>
\n </button>
\n <ul class="u-menu u-menu-bottom-right" for="split">
\n <li class="u-menu-item"><a>报价单</a></li>
\n <li class="u-menu-item"><a>到货单</a></li>
\n </ul>
\n </div>
\n</div>
\n
\n \n

##左边menu

\n
\n
\n
\n \n 左对齐 \n
    \n
  • 新增
    • \n
  • 修改
    • \n
  • 删除
    • \n
  • 审核
    • \n
\n
\n \n
\n 右对齐 \n
    \n
  • 新增
    • \n
  • 修改
    • \n
  • 删除
    • \n
  • 审核
    • \n
\n
\n
.example{
\n padding-left: 30px;
\n}
\n
\n
<!-- Left aligned menu below button -->
\n<div class="example">
\n <button id="demo-menu-lower-left" class="u-button floating u-button-icon">
\n <i class="uf uf-verticalellipsis"></i>
\n </button>
\n 左对齐
\n <ul class="u-menu u-menu-bottom-left" for="demo-menu-lower-left">
\n <li class="u-menu-item">新增</li>
\n <li class="u-menu-item">修改</li>
\n <li disabled class="u-menu-item">删除</li>
\n <li class="u-menu-item">审核</li>
\n </ul>
\n</div>
\n<!-- right aligned menu below button -->
\n<div class="example">
\n <button id="demo-menu-lower-right" class="u-button floating u-button-icon">
\n <i class="uf uf-verticalellipsis"></i>
\n </button>右对齐
\n <ul class="u-menu u-menu-bottom-right" for="demo-menu-lower-right">
\n <li class="u-menu-item">新增</li>
\n <li class="u-menu-item">修改</li>
\n <li disabled class="u-menu-item">删除</li>
\n <li class="u-menu-item">审核</li>
\n </ul>
\n</div>
\n
\n \n

##不同颜色的下拉 \n按钮配色，不同的色彩代表不同的情感和状态。添加颜色样式类分别为.u-button-success、u-button-info、u-button-danger、u-button-warning。

\n
\n
\n \n
    \n
  • action zero
    • \n
  • action one
    • \n
  • action two
    • \n
  • action three
    • \n
\n
\n
\n \n
    \n
  • action zero
    • \n
  • action one
    • \n
  • action two
    • \n
  • action three
    • \n
\n
\n
\n \n
    \n
  • action zero
    • \n
  • action one
    • \n
  • action two
    • \n
  • action three
    • \n
\n
\n
\n \n
    \n
  • action zero
    • \n
  • action one
    • \n
  • action two
    • \n
  • action three
    • \n
\n
\n
\n
<div class="u-row">
\n <div class="u-col-3">
\n <button class="u-button u-button-success u-menu-button" id="demo-menu-sucess">
\n success
\n <span class="u-right-icon uf uf-anglearrowdown"></span>
\n </button>
\n <ul class="u-menu u-menu-bottom-right u-menu-success" for="demo-menu-sucess">
\n <li class="u-menu-item"><a href="javascript:void(0)">action zero</a></li>
\n <li class="u-menu-item"><a href="javascript:void(0)">action one</a></li>
\n <li class="u-menu-item"><a href="javascript:void(0)">action two</a></li>
\n <li class="u-menu-item"><a href="javascript:void(0)">action three</a></li>
\n </ul>
\n </div>
\n <div class="u-col-3">
\n <button class="u-button u-button-info u-menu-button" id="demo-menu-info">
\n info
\n <span class="u-right-icon uf uf-anglearrowdown"></span>
\n </button>
\n <ul class="u-menu u-menu-bottom-right u-menu-info" for="demo-menu-info">
\n <li class="u-menu-item"><a href="javascript:void(0)">action zero</a></li>
\n <li class="u-menu-item"><a href="javascript:void(0)">action one</a></li>
\n <li class="u-menu-item"><a href="javascript:void(0)">action two</a></li>
\n <li class="u-menu-item"><a href="javascript:void(0)">action three</a></li>
\n </ul>
\n </div>
\n <div class="u-col-3">
\n <button class="u-button u-button-danger u-menu-button" id="demo-menu-danger">
\n danger
\n <span class="u-right-icon uf uf-anglearrowdown"></span>
\n </button>
\n <ul class="u-menu u-menu-bottom-right u-menu-danger" for="demo-menu-danger">
\n <li class="u-menu-item"><a href="javascript:void(0)">action zero</a></li>
\n <li class="u-menu-item"><a href="javascript:void(0)">action one</a></li>
\n <li class="u-menu-item"><a href="javascript:void(0)">action two</a></li>
\n <li class="u-menu-item"><a href="javascript:void(0)">action three</a></li>
\n </ul>
\n </div>
\n <div class="u-col-3">
\n <button class="u-button u-button-warning u-menu-button" id="demo-menu-warning">
\n warning
\n <span class="u-right-icon uf uf-anglearrowdown"></span>
\n </button>
\n <ul class="u-menu u-menu-bottom-right u-menu-warning" for="demo-menu-warning">
\n <li class="u-menu-item"><a href="javascript:void(0)">action zero</a></li>
\n <li class="u-menu-item"><a href="javascript:void(0)">action one</a></li>
\n <li class="u-menu-item"><a href="javascript:void(0)">action two</a></li>
\n <li class="u-menu-item"><a href="javascript:void(0)">action three</a></li>
\n </ul>
\n </div>
\n</div>
\n
\n \n

##基本菜单按钮 \n菜单按钮包括一个普通的button按钮和一个下拉内容ul元素。显示效果有4种， \n分别为：显示在按钮下方，左对齐、显示在按钮下方，右对齐、显示在按钮上方，左对齐、显示在按钮上方，右对齐。

\n

具体使用

\n
    \n

  • 创建button元素，添加id属性，属性值可以自己定义 点击它时，菜单会进行隐藏或者显示。

    \n
    • \n

  • 创建样式为“u-menu”的ul下拉列表，用于包括菜单内容。ul上定义for属性，属性值与第一步创建button中的id对应。菜单的样式还可以选择u-menu-bottom-left、u-menu-bottom-right、u-menu-top-left、u-menu-top-right中的一个来表示菜单相对于按钮的显示位置。

    \n
    • \n

  • 在ul标签内，使用样式为u-menu-item的li标签定义菜单的具体内容，当li标签不可用时，可以添加disabled属性。

    \n
    • \n
\n
\n
    \n
  • 报价单
    • \n
  • 到货单
    • \n
\n
<button class="u-button raised u-menu-button" id="demo-menu-lower-right1">
\n 联查
\n <span class="u-right-icon uf uf-anglearrowdown"></span>
\n</button>
\n<ul class="u-menu u-menu-bottom-right" for="demo-menu-lower-right1">
\n <li class="u-menu-item "><a>报价单</a></li>
\n <li class="u-menu-item"><a>到货单</a></li>
\n</ul>
\n
